title: 'Best Shoes...'
body: 'Exact Product as shown comfortable and shiny shoes. Tnks u centrino'

title: 'Doesn’t meet my expectations'
body: 'The shoe is not very premium but looks good for the given price. Personally I liked the colour very much. However I walked only few metres inside my room and noticed that the shoe has already started to have lines and don’t think the shoe will last even 3months. Also the shoe lace is different from the one shown in the product image and the shoe lace looks very cheap. Overall the shoe has not met my expectations.'

title: 'Looks & usability'
body: 'Looks quite nice. I wanted to use on my suit in marriage ceremony. My use is not regular. It served the purpose. Value for money.'
